name: Kaylie VanWolvelaere
title: Product Marketer & GTM Strategist
quote: Prashant has been the most strategic and capable product managers I've had the pleasure of working with. We partnered closely for over two years on our Shopify integration, during which he consistently demonstrated sharp product instincts, strong cross-functional leadership, and a deep commitment to delivering meaningful customer value. Prashant is excellent at prioritizing roadmap items based on customer needs, level of effort, and level of impact. He's a thoughtful collaborator who ensures the right stakeholders are involved at the right times. Prashant is reliable and can be counted on to do what he says he's going to do. I admire that he doesn't settle for the status quo - he is always looking for ways to innovate, problem-solve, and not default to doing things the way they've always been done. Prashant approaches problems with curiosity and creativity and I was constantly learning from him. I don't think there is anyone else who could've handled this specific project we worked on together and I hope our paths cross again.

name: India Anderson
title: Director, Product Management @ Avalara
quote: TLDR - If you get the opportunity to have Prashant on your team, do it. I had the pleasure of managing Prashant during his time at Avalara, and he consistently stood out as a thoughtful, dependable, and technically sharp team member. Prashant brought a rare combination of product thinking, attention to detail, and calm execution to every initiative he touched. One of Prashant's standout strengths is his deep technical acumen. He played a key role in helping our developers ramp up on the new tax platform with Shopify — not only by understanding the nuances of the integration himself, but by actively mentoring others and translating complex concepts into clear, actionable guidance. His ability to bridge product and engineering made him a critical contributor to accelerating team onboarding and delivery. Whether he was diving deep into system behavior to identify root causes, collaborating across functions to unblock progress, or refining requirements to ensure clarity and precision, Prashant approached each challenge with both humility and rigor. His user-first mindset grounded decisions in real-world customer experience, and he consistently worked to build solutions that were not just functional, but elegant and maintainable. He's the kind of teammate who makes a team better — not just through his work, but through the steady, collaborative energy he brings to every project. He helped to level up the team like a rising tide. I'd gladly work with him again and recommend him without hesitation.

name: Oliver St.George
title: Sr. PMM @ Avalara
quote: As a product manager, Prashant is incredibly thoughtful, collaborative, and solutions-oriented. Prashant consistently brings clarity to complex challenges and has a knack for balancing technical considerations with the customer experience. Whether we were launching new functionality or navigating edge cases with merchants, I could always count on Prashant. What stands out most is their dedication to cross-functional collaboration. Prashant makes it easy to align across teams — from product and engineering to marketing and sales — ensuring that we're all working toward a shared goal. If you're looking for a product manager who leads with empathy, executes with precision, and is genuinely great to work with, I can't recommend Prashant highly enough.
